title: Matchmaker Mayhem
logline: A true test of communication, match compatible singles on dates before time runs out in this chaotic tabletop game.
description: A cooperative race against time where you and your matchmaking partner try to match a selection of eligible singles before the deadline. Communication skills and chemistry are a must when trying to balance compatibility between traits, star signs, and location all while working with limited information. Match well enough, and you can become a Love God.
credits: Designer (Rules Writing, Asset Production, Playtest and Usability)
